sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-manage-faq', templateUrl: './manage-faq.page.html', styleUrls: ['./manage-faq.page.scss'], }) export class ManageFAQPage implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } } Medical FAQs
Patient Assessment What is the first responsibility of the EMT-B on the scene of an emergency before starting to assess the patient? SCENE SIZE-UP 1. Dispatch information 2. Body Substance Isolation 3. Scene Safety/Scene hazards 4. Mechanism of injury/ Nature of illness 5. Number of patients 6. Additional resources needed 7. C-Spine Immobilization
